Class IncrementalBackoffReconnectSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.tcp.spec.IncrementalBackoffReconnectSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    reactor.function.Supplier<Reconnect>

    public class IncrementalBackoffReconnectSpec
extends java.lang.Object
implements reactor.function.Supplier<Reconnect>
    A helper class for configure a new Reconnect.
